skins.shipDescription: I am Purple Heart, the CPU of Planeptune. And you must be the commander. I will follow your orders from now.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Purple Heart, the CPU of Planeptune. People always tell me they're amazed by how different I am in HDD form. How rude. This form is exhausting to be in, so I don't transform unless I have to.
skins.acquisition: I am Purple Heart, the CPU of Planeptune. You must be the commander. I will follow your orders from now on.
skins.login: Welcome back. Shall we sortie? Do some exercise battles? Or perhaps... have some pudding?
skins.details: If you're so interested in me, why don't you come closer?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I am relieved everyone here is so kind. I will have no issue fighting with all my strength.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I could really use something to drink... Would there happen to be any custard pudding around here?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh, Commander? Could you tell me something I should know about your world?
skins.secretaryTouch: Ahh...! Listen, if you want my attention then you could just ask for it.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You're awfully assertive, I see. Do keep the time and place in mind, though.

skins.shipDescription: Oh, Commander? Won't you join me in a short conversation? I'll tell you things about Planeptune. Oh, and I'm eagerly awaiting the day you come to Planeptune for a visit.
